description.p:
Hypnos is:
A cross-platform music player and music library with a simple but powerful interface.
For people who have a lot of albums and songs on their computer and want to listen to them without any headaches.
Features:
Support for all popular audio file formats, and some esoteric audio formats.
Library Scanner/Updater
Album, Track, and Playlist views
Simple Tag Editor
Custom Playlist Manager
Global Hotkeys
LastFM
Light and dark themes
History, queue, m3u and folder exporting
Tag error log
Artist and Album artwork display
